snippet: White House officials are weighing their options, knowing that reversing the occupation of Crimea would be difficult, if not impossible, in the short run.
abstract: News analysis; Pres Vladimir V Putin's assurance that Russia does not plan for now to seize eastern Ukraine suggests possible path forward in the geopolitical crisis; development presents conundrum for Pres Obama and his European allies about what to do about Russia's occupation of the Crimean Peninsula.
lead_paragraph: White House officials are weighing their options, knowing that reversing the occupation of Crimea would be difficult, if not impossible, in the short run.

headline.main: No Easy Way Out of Ukraine Crisis
